properties.name: MAX_SIDE_LENGTH
properties.description: Maximum side length of image (pixels). Larger values improve recall, but cause significant slowdown. For unlimited, supply -1.

properties.name: CONFIDENCE_THRESHOLD
properties.description: Thershold for filtering detections based on model confidence.

properties.name: NMS_THRESHOLD
properties.description: Theshold for filtering detections based on IOU (intersect over union)

properties.name: ROTATE_ON
properties.description: Whether to perform a second pass on the image rotated 90 degrees, to pick up more vertical text.

properties.name: BATCH_SIZE
properties.description: Number of frames to pass at a time when running on video.

properties.name: SUBTRACT_BLUE_VALUE
properties.description: After the input image is resized and cropped, subtract this value from the blue color channel for all of the pixels. The range is [0.0, 255.0].

properties.name: SUBTRACT_GREEN_VALUE
properties.description: After the input image is resized and cropped, subtract this value from the green color channel for all of the pixels. The range is [0.0, 255.0].

properties.name: SUBTRACT_RED_VALUE
properties.description: After the input image is resized and cropped, subtract this value from the red color channel for all of the pixels. The range is [0.0, 255.0].
